Title: S4:E8 - What’s it like to be the CTO of Microsoft? (Kevin Scott)
Description: Kevin Scott is the first CTO of Microsoft in almost twenty years. But what does the chief technology officer at such a large tech company do? He tells us all about his day-to-day, how he ended up at Microsoft, and shares his thoughts on the value of computer science degrees. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
